name: Fetch customer channel information using CIF Key

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000932350225000"
When I fetch the channel information for CIF Key: "0100000932350225000"

children.description: Get customer channel info using http get: 0100000932350225000

testSteps.description:
Then the following channel information should be returned in the list
| registrationNumber | sbibCustomer | sbibEligible | registrationDate | pacStatus | pacReorderDate | pacDigits | newMessageTotal | newEmails | messageTotal | invalidCountPac |
| 60745321 | true | true | 2016-04-12 | Active |  |  | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 |

children.description: Validate response: CustomerChannelInformationResponse [registrationNumber=60745321, registrationDate=Tue Apr 12 00:00:00 BST 2016, messageTotal=0, newMessageTotal=0, pacStatus=Active, invalidCountPac=0, pacDigits=, pacReorderDate=null, usageTimeStamp=null, channelAuthInfo=[], sbibCustomer=true, sbibEligible=true, new_emails=0]

userStory.storyName: Fetch the channel information for a customer

title: Fetch customer channel information using CIF Key

tags.name: Fetch the channel information for a customer
